metadata.title: CVE-2021-29970 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A malicious webpage could have triggered a use-after-free, memorycorruption, and a potentially exploitable crash. *This bug could only betriggered when accessibility was enabled.*. This vulnerability affectsThunderbird < 78.12, Firefox ESR < 78.12, and Firefox < 90.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
